SELECT board_id AS boardId, writer_id AS writerId, title, content, category, register_date AS registerDate, modify_date AS modifyDate, likes FROM board WHERE board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_id, writer_id, title, content, category, register_date ) VALUES (#{boardId},#{writerId},#{title},#{content},#{category}, NOW())
